mapper.update: UPDATE artworks SET title = #{title}, caption = #{caption}, create_at = #{createAt}, page_count = ${pageCount}, sanity_level = ${sanityLevel}, type = #{type}, width = ${width}, height = ${height}, total_bookmarks = ${totalBookmarks}, total_comments = ${totalComments}, total_view = ${totalView}, age = ${age}, is_ero = ${isEro} WHERE pid = ${pid};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM not_deleted WHERE pid IN ( SELECT tags.pid FROM tags WHERE ( ${fuzzy} AND (name LIKE '%' || #{tag} || '%' OR translated_name LIKE '%' || #{tag} || '%') ) OR (name LIKE #{tag} OR translated_name LIKE #{tag}) ) AND total_bookmarks >= ${bookmarks};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM not_deleted WHERE is_ero AND age = 0;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM not_deleted WHERE is_ero AND NOT age = 0;
SELECT DISTINCT not_deleted.pid FROM not_deleted WHERE is_ero AND not_deleted.pid NOT IN (SELECT files.pid FROM files) ORDER BY pid DESC
SELECT DISTINCT not_deleted.pid FROM not_deleted WHERE is_ero AND not_deleted.pid NOT IN (SELECT tags.pid FROM tags) ORDER BY pid DESC
